text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Woah… Was the Droite always that exciting?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
No, this year is much livelier than last one. 
I'm sure our dance contributed as well.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You think so? More importantly, should the ever popular Fuji-san be out here?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Aren't you doing a speech at the end too? 
Sounds pretty tough.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Before that, I wanted to get some fresh air. 
And you're fairly popular yourself. 
Your friends were looking for you.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
They're probably just looking to tease me. 
Anyway, if you came out here to thank me, 
There's no need.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You really are clever. 
But I don't think you understand how passionate I am.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Sky… 
…for being my date.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
My judgment ended up being right. 
You really were the best trickster out there. 
The crowd's cheers were proof of that.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure it'll be a wonderful memory for everyone. 
Thank you so much! 
I'm sorry for forcing you into it.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
You don't need to apologize. 
I'm the one who agreed to your conditions. 
And anyway, I don't think…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well, we definitely got to see a new side of Shakur-san.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
We'd better thank her as well. 
It looks like we'll be having a lot of mock races next year.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But, I think my darling little ponies will start to worry. 
I'm going to head back in. So…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's right! 
There was something I wanted to say to you, Fuji-san.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Won't you lend me your ear?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hmm?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: —Wha- H-Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You look beautiful in your dress.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I had a hard time being honest, but… 
You really do look like a goddess.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Gotcha, just kidding!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
My surprise was a huge success! 
I figured I'd get my revenge at some point. 
That was a glimpse of my handsome side!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, looks like it's time to get back in there. 
Good luck with your speech! Later!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That really did surprise me… 
You didn't have to, if it'd embarrass you so much.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
(But it seems like her feelings are completely refreshed. 
I'm glad.)

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
(I'm the head of a different dorm, so I didn't want to meddle… 
But when I saw her looking like that… You know.)

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Now seeing as my date, for all her shyness, finally complimented 
me… I'd better give them a great speech.

text_block_list.name: Student Host
text_block_list.text:
Alright, since we've announced the best couple of the night… 
It's time for our closing speech!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Everyone, did you enjoy this year's Ligne Droite? For some of you it's the first time, And others, it's the last…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But we'll always be fighting. No matter where we may be, every 
single day. To the extent that we exhaust our hearts and bodies. 
We run with all our might.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That's what we've always dreamed of! So we never 
stop. But… When you've worked too hard, and tired 
yourselves out, I want you to remember today.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You, and the girl next to you, everyone is dashing down their own 
path in life. And each one of you is beautiful… and precious, 
the lead actors in your own lives!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That stretch is one only you can run. 
So take that step however you like! 
And make it count!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I knew it, Fuji-san and I are nothing alike. 
I mean, she's so pretty.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You got me to dance with you this time, But I swear I'll return the favor someday… My lovely date.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh, I have a feeling things are going to get annoying. And I was just about to plan out my next race. Which means…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Time to split♪
